attributes.action: I would like for social services to record all interactions with families
attributes.additional_details: I would like the government to agree for the local authorities to be recorded or record everything for the protection of all parties instead of the context been misguided or out of context and then this information going towards court. If everything was recorded there wouldn’t be nothing been misguided or out of context and the evidence is in the recording
attributes.background: I would like the government to require that social services to record all interactions with families and third parties.I would like the procedures to be changed as the local authorities do not agree to be recorded in meetings

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642514
